txt.en: 'I know that Théoden King plans to gather many thousands of sword and spear, and then to ride for Minas Tirith in satisfaction of ancient bonds of loyalty and friendship. Our two kingdoms have long been allies, since the days of Eorl, and we will stand together against our enemies.\n\n'I am afraid that is the extent of my knowledge. I have never travelled in Gondor.'
What do you know about Gondor?
